name: Warawara Invaders (itch)
description:
Warawara Invaders is a 2d casual rolling shooter for killing time!

Features:
  • 30 stages per round.
  • The playing time until the end of 1 round is about 15 to 30 minutes.
  • Mouse & XInput controller are supported. Some shortcut operations are supported with a keyboard.
  • No scrolling. Fixed screen.
  • Although it is Shmup, there is no need to avoid bullets. In any case destroy enemies and enemy bullets!
  • Practice mode (Stage select) is implemented.
  • Because of very low level difficulty, it is best for killing time.
  • It is also recommended for beginners in shmups. But it is not suitable for hard core gamers.
  • The difficulty level is NORMAL only.
  • ogg format original sound track is included.

Warning: Objects on the screen are always rotating, so please be careful about motion sickness. Please refer to the movie about the contents of the game.

Game systems:

For explanation of the game system & how to play,  please refer to the link below.
Official site (en) / Official site (ja)

OST :

This game contains OST contents. These files are included in the product. The file format is ogg, then you can  play with the ogg format compatible player. For most musics, recommended to play with "loop playback" function.

Differences between Steam version & itch.io version:
  • Steam version corresponds to Steam’s online leader board and achievements, possible to save config & data files to the Steam cloud.
  • itch.io version is DRM free, and you can play the game completely offline.
